settings.mission_content: To bring transparency to an industry plagued with misleading and dishonest practices by putting the health and well-being of pets front and center. With a modern eye on innovation, delivering products that offer nothing but the highest quality of nutrition and care for your furry family members is our simple goal.
settings.vision_content:
To deliver 100M bowls of transparent and nutritious pet food around the world.

To make it more convenient for pet parents to access premium pet nutrition through widespread availability via mainstream retail distribution channels.

settings.author: Dr. John Smith

settings.heading: Formulated by nutritionists, praised by vets

settings.subtitle: WE BELIEVE IN
settings.title: transparency
settings.description: We aspire to elevate the level of transparency in the industry. From our ingredients and recipes to how different things affect a pet’s health. We aim to bring it all out in the open.

settings.subtitle: WE BELIEVE IN
settings.title: nutrition
settings.description: We believe pet food can be both tasty and nutritious. It plays a significant role in a healthy, happy and balanced lifestyle and should make a positive contribution to the health and development of your pet.

settings.subtitle: WE BELIEVE IN
settings.title: togetherness
settings.description: We believe in bringing people together by creating a community of pet parents, caring for them and their pets, and making a difference to the ones who aren’t as fortunate.

settings.subtitle: WE BELIEVE IN
settings.title: simplicity
settings.description: We believe in the power of simplicity. Every experience from the decision on what to purchase to unboxing should feel effortless and convenient for every full time pet parent.

settings.heading: Committed to dog parents & dogs all over the world
Our Purpose: Giving Back to Dogs in Need
settings.content:
With every order purchased, we give a % back to local shelters, rescue organizations, and animal welfare projects to help dogs and pups in need.

  • PhilippineRescueShelter.org
  • AsiaRescueOrganization.org
  • AnimalWelfareUnited.org
  • PhilippineRescueShelter.org
  • AsiaRescueOrganization.org
  • AnimalWelfareUnited.org
